benchmark_details.name: TLDR (Text-Based Last Layer Retraining for Debiasing Image Classifiers)
benchmark_details.overview: TLDR is a method that uses text-based last layer retraining to debias image classifiers, eliminating the need for group-annotated image datasets.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To debias a general image classifier using text-based last-layer retraining.

data.source: Generated text datasets using large language models and publicly available datasets.
data.annotation: Automatically generated using large language models.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on performance evaluation on benchmark datasets.
methodology.interpretation: Higher WGA and Mean Accuracy indicate better debiasing performance.
